gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Bulls 125, Grizzlies 96
gameRecap.excerpt: The Bulls defeated the Grizzlies, 125-96. Ayo Dosunmu recorded 20 points, six rebounds and four assists for the Bulls, while DeMar DeRozan added 18 points and eight assists in the victory. Jaren Jackson Jr. tallied 26 points, six rebounds and five assists for the Grizzlies in the losing effort. The Bulls have won back-to-back games as they improve to 21-23 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 15-27.
